description: This file is a Python script that initializes a knowledge base with documents, sets up a vector database, and performs queries using an agent, specifically related to document filtering and retrieval in a knowledge management system.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a LanceDB vector database for storing and querying document embeddings.

classes.name: DocxKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base composed of DOCX documents, including loading and metadata filtering.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class that facilitates querying the knowledge base with filters and generating responses.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample DOCX files for testing knowledge filters.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads documents into the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprtint_response
methods.description: Generates a response based on a query, applying knowledge filters and formatting output.
